thread.section_title: Archive News & Video for Tuesday, 30 Jan 2018 | Reuters.com
thread.title: BRIEF-Geeya Technology receives judgment for securities misrepresention liability disputes lawsuit

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Geeya Technology receives judgment for securities misrepresention liability disputes lawsuit
text:
Jan 30(Reuters) - Geeya Technology Co Ltd
* Says co received judgment of first instance regarding securities misrepresention liability disputes lawsuit filed by 72 individuals (plaintiffs) against the co
* Says co was ordered to pay 1.6 million yuan to plaintiffs and to bear lawsuit related costs of 259,828.75 yuan
Source text in Chinese: goo.gl/rhZjfq
Further company coverage: (Beijing Headline News)
